reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Maximising Livelihood Options Advocacy Health and Gender Equity Among Marginalised Residents of the Bwabwata National Park

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to misimize livelihood options among the park residents. In addition the project aims at providing support with advocacy health and gender equity among the marginalised residents. Local leadership (particularly youth) will be equi pped with skills to advocate for improved education health and rights to benefit from natural resources. Furthermore the project will equip women to become active participants to democratic decision making concerning their lives.
